Scale it by a factor of 0.75. 1.4 Transform the scaled 2D sketch using the coordinate system defined for this part. 1.5 Extrude the 3D model from the scaled and transformed 2D sketch by 0.5 units along the opposite direction of the normal. This should create a new rectangular prism body in the CAD model. 1.6 Store the following description in the "description" property of "part\\_1" in the CAD Assembly JSON: ```json { "shape": "A rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides.
